summary: This is an email exchange between an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York and an individual named Ilan, discussing strategy for a potential indictment related to Jeffrey Epstein. The email references specific deposition statements from individuals named Boies and McCawley concerning knowledge of Epstein's sexual activities and recruitment of underage girls.

persons.name: Ilan
persons.context: Addressee of the email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney; the sender seeks to confirm statements and discuss indictment strategy with him.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Referenced as the person who identified key deposition statements and has conveyed thoughts to Ilan; central to the strategy discussion.

persons.name: Boies
persons.context: Individual whose deposition statements are cited, specifically denying giving massages and discussing sex toys in relation to Epstein.

persons.name: McCawley
persons.context: Individual whose deposition statements are cited, addressing awareness of Epstein's sexual activities and the ages of individuals involved.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central subject of the investigation; the deposition statements concern knowledge of his sexual activities and alleged scheme to recruit underage girls.

connections.description: Geoff has conveyed thoughts to Ilan, and they are collaborating on legal strategy regarding the Epstein case.
The AUSA is coordinating with Ilan to discuss indictment strategy and confirm deposition statements.
Boies provided deposition testimony regarding his knowledge and interactions with Jeffrey Epstein.
McCawley provided deposition testimony regarding his awareness of Epstein's activities and the ages of individuals involved.

events.title: Strategy Discussion
events.description: A discussion occurred involving Ilan and the email sender, where thoughts and input were shared regarding the Epstein case.

events.title: Scheduled Webex Meeting
events.description: A Webex meeting is scheduled for Tuesday to discuss indictment strategy and specific deposition statements.

keyFacts: Prosecutors are actively formulating an indictment strategy against Jeffrey Epstein as of May 2020.
Key deposition statements from witnesses Boies and McCawley are being analyzed, focusing on denials of knowledge about Epstein's sexual activities and recruitment of underage girls.
The communication reveals coordination between an Assistant U.S. Attorney, a prosecutor named Geoff, and an external advisor named Ilan on the case.
